verses.verse: In the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius, <S%H1867><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo, <S%H5714><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was very <S%H7110><s%> displeased <S%H7107><s%> with your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Therefore tell <S%H559><s%> them: <S%H559><s%> Thus says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Return to me, <S%H559><s%>' says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'and I will return to you, <S%H5002><s%>' says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

Don't <S%H1><s%> you be like your fathers, to whom the former <S%H7223><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> proclaimed, <S%H7121><s%> saying: <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Return now from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> and from your evil <S%H7451><s%> doings; <S%H4611><s%>' but they did not hear, <S%H8085><s%> nor listen <S%H7181><s%> to me, <S%H5002><s%> says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Your fathers, <S%H1><s%> where are they? <S%H5030><s%> And the prophets, do they live <S%H2421><s%> forever? <S%H5769><s%>

But my words <S%H1697><s%> and my decrees, <S%H2706><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> didn't <S%H5381><s%> they overtake your fathers? <S%H1><s%> "Then they repented <S%H7725><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Just as Yahweh of Armies <S%H6635><s%> determined <S%H2161><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to us, <S%H1870><s%> according to our ways, and according to our practices, <S%H4611><s%> so he has dealt with us. <S%H6213><s%>'"

On the twenty <S%H6242><s%> - fourth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> which is the month <S%H2320><s%> Shebat, <S%H7627><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius, <S%H1867><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah, <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo, <S%H5714><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"I had a vision <S%H7200><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%> and behold, <S%H376><s%> a man riding <S%H7392><s%> on a red <S%H122><s%> horse, <S%H5483><s%> and he stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle trees <S%H1918><s%> that were in a ravine; <S%H4699><s%> and behind <S%H310><s%> him there were red, <S%H122><s%> brown, <S%H8320><s%> and white <S%H3836><s%> horses. <S%H5483><s%>
Then I asked, <S%H559><s%> <S%H113><s%> 'My lord, what are these? <S%H4397><s%>'" The angel who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7200><s%> "I will show you what these are."

The man <S%H376><s%> who stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle trees <S%H1918><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> "They are the ones Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> back and forth through the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

They reported <S%H6030><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who stood <S%H5975><s%> among the myrtle trees, <S%H1918><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "We have walked back and forth <S%H1980><s%> through the earth, <S%H776><s%> and behold, <S%H776><s%> all the earth is at rest <S%H3427><s%> and in peace. <S%H8252><s%>"

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> replied, <S%H6030><s%> "O Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> how long will you not have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and on the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> against which you have had indignation <S%H2194><s%> these seventy <S%H7657><s%> years? <S%H8141><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me with kind <S%H2896><s%> and comforting <S%H5150><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>

So the angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7121><s%> "Proclaim, saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "I am jealous <S%H7065><s%> for Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and for Zion <S%H6726><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>

I am very <S%H1419><s%> <S%H7110><s%> angry <S%H7107><s%> with the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are at ease; <S%H7600><s%> for I was but a little <S%H4592><s%> displeased, <S%H7107><s%> but they added <S%H5826><s%> to the calamity. <S%H7451><s%>"

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "I have returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with mercy. <S%H7356><s%> My house <S%H1004><s%> shall be built <S%H1129><s%> in it, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "and a line <S%H6957><s%> shall be stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> over Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>"'

"Proclaim <S%H7121><s%> further, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> "My cities <S%H5892><s%> will again overflow <S%H6327><s%> with prosperity, <S%H2896><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will again comfort <S%H5162><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and will again choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>"'"
I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H702><s%> four horns. <S%H7161><s%>

I asked <S%H559><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, <S%H559><s%> "What are these?" He answered me, <S%H7161><s%> "These are the horns which have scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H7200><s%> me four <S%H702><s%> craftsmen. <S%H2796><s%>

Then I asked, <S%H559><s%> "What are these coming <S%H935><s%> to do? <S%H6213><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "These are the horns <S%H7161><s%> which scattered <S%H2219><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> so that <S%H6310><s%> no man <S%H376><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his head; <S%H7218><s%> but these have come <S%H935><s%> to terrify <S%H2729><s%> them, <S%H3034><s%> to cast down the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> which lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their horn <S%H7161><s%> against the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> to scatter it. <S%H2219><s%>"
